definitions.definition: The state or condition of having weight; weight; heaviness.
The state or condition of being grave; seriousness.
definitions.example: I hope you appreciate the gravity of the situation.

definitions.definition: Force on Earth's surface, of the attraction by the Earth's masses, and the centrifugal pseudo-force caused by the Earth's rotation, resulting from gravitation.
(in casual discussion, also) Gravitation, universal force exercised by two bodies onto each other (gravity and gravitation are often used interchangeably).
